item.title: Hono Gurashi no Niwa main trailer, latest details and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
Nippon Ichi Software has released a new trailer for rural life simulation game Hono Gurashi no Niwa, as well as new information and screenshots introducing the village’s ancient rules and “things” encountered late at night.

■ Summary

This is Kagatsu Village, a small, quiet village nestled deep in the mountains.

The young protagonist was wandering through the mountains when they were rescued by nearby villagers, and on this land they began a new life.

They tend a neglected garden, grow crops, and sometimes go on leisurely fishing trips…

Time passes peacefully and quietly in Kagatsu Village.

However, strange events begin to occur in this peaceful village.

The fathomless rules of Kagatsu Village are enforced, the villagers stubbornly keep quiet, and signs of someone encroaching upon everyday life begin to appear.

As each day passes, the mysteries of this land slowly come to light.

Will the protagonist be able to uncover the village’s dark secrets and become a “true villager”?

■ A Faint Uneasiness Lingers in Calm Conversation

The villagers are all gentle and kind. But at unexpected moments, they utter words that catch your attention. As an outsider, the protagonist is told nothing more. The true meaning of their words remains unclear, leaving behind a lingering sense of unease.

The closer you grow to them, the more they may begin to open up. However, the village’s “secret” seems to be rooted deep within.

—The villagers whisper amongst themselves so the protagonist cannot hear. It seems there are topics they do not want the protagonist to overhear.

—They speak vaguely and never touch upon the core of the matter. The protagonist may sometimes feel as if they are being “kept in the dark.”

■ The Eight Rules of Kagatsu Village

Kagatsu Village has a long history, and certain ancient customs still remain today. When the protagonist settles into the village, they are told they must abide by “The Eight Rules of Kagatsu Village.”

“Do not approach strangers.”

“Do not seek out lost items.”

The reasons behind these rules are a mystery.

The village chief explains that “these rules are meant to protect the village’s prosperous way of life,” but…

—The villagers speak in threatening ways to prevent you from breaking the rules.

—Following the rules appears to be something deeply ingrained in the villagers’ way of life..

—Some villagers seem to break the rules and wander around at night. What could be the reason behind this…?

Kagatsu Village Late at Night Is Much Different from Daytime

Despite there being no one else out, you may feel the presence of someone behind you. Even so, wandering the village late at night may bring you closer to uncovering the mysteries the villagers have kept hidden.

Summon your courage, break the rules, and step into the darkness of Kagatsu Village.

—Don’t forget your flashlight when exploring late at night.

—Late at night, you may come across unfamiliar lost items. Some of them might prove useful in your everyday life.

■ Late-Night Encounters in Kagatsu Village

Late at night, you will encounter beings that cannot be explained as mere extensions of daily life. Are they dangerous? Or do they simply exist?

The answers will gradually reveal themselves as you explore the village at night.

■ “Safe Living Mode”

By selecting “Safe Living Mode,” you can enjoy daytime village life while continuing to follow the rules. Even players who are not fond of scary experiences can focus on life simulation and spend each day peacefully.

■ Main Trailer

The newly released main trailer for Hono Gurashi no Niwa depicts Kagatsu Village as it truly is—shifting from its warm daytime atmosphere, to suspicious villagers and the “things” encountered late at night.

Come witness the previously unrevealed side of Kagatsu Village, along with the main theme.
